text: Mihai Cristian Tentea (born 30 December 1998) is a Romanian bobsledder. He competed in the two-man event at the 2018 Winter Olympics, as the youngest athlete in competition. ==References== Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian male bobsledders Category:Olympic bobsledders of Romania Category:Bobsledders at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Mihai Cristian Tentea
